name: Fonts
body:
A collection of downloadable font files, categorized by type. \*

## How to Use
This repository contains fonts for your computer, not your website (i.e. you can use them in Microsoft Word, Pages, etc.). Instructions:

#### Version 1: Download the whole enchilada, and install only some fonts

1. Download a `.zip` or tarball of the repository (on site, or GitHub)
2. Selectively install the fonts you like
3. Delete the `.zip` or tarball from your Downloads folder when you're done (to save space)

#### Version 2: Selectively download from GitHub

1. If you view a raw font file, *usually* it will try to download.
2. Selectively view the raw files of each font file you want to download
3. Install the fonts by clicking on them/opening them.

## Exhaustive Font List
Below is a list of all the fonts in the repository:

- [Abel](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/sans-serif/abel)
- [Alegreya](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/serif/alegreya)
- [Alegreya Sans](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/sans-serif/alegreya-sans)
- [Alegreya SC](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/serif/alegreya-sc)
- [Alegreya Sans SC](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/sans-serif/alegreya-sans-sc)
- [Anton](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/sans-serif/anton)
- [Arimo](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/sans-serif/arimo)
- [Arvo](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/slab-serif/arvo)
- [Bangers](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/display/bangers)
- [Beacon](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/cursive-handwritten/beacon)
- [Bebas Neue](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/sans-serif/bebas-neue)
- [Bitters](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/slab-serif/bitters)
- [Bree Serif](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/slab-serif/bree-serif)
- [Cabin](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/sans-serif/cabin)
- [Candal](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/sans-serif/candal)
- [Clemente](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/sans-serif/clemente)
- [Constantine](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/serif/constantine)
- [Dosis](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/sans-serif/dosis)
- [Droid Sans](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/sans-serif/droid-sans)
- [Droid Serif](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/serif/droid-serif)
- [Facet](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/display/facet)
- [Fipps](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/display/fipps)
- [Fjalla One](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/sans-serif/fjalla-one)
- [Freshman](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/display/freshman)
- [Goudy Bookletter 1911](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/serif/goudy-bookletter-1911)
- [Hind](https://github.com/stingclaw/fonts/tree/master/sans-serif/hind)
- Inconsolata
- Indie Flower
- Josefin Sans
- Lato
- Liberation Mono
- Liberation Sans
- Liberation Serif
- Liquid Crystal
- Lobster
- Molot
- Old London
- Olivetti Type 2
- Quicksans
- Riffic
- Snowstorm
- Tribal
- White Rabbit

---

##### \* This could be interpreted as a pun, considering the two definitions of the word *type*.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
